summary: When a man inherits his grandfather's arena, he and his family try to restore the family wrestling business with the help of a talking monkey, and their star attraction, a wrestling dog.
cast: Sean Giambrone|David Milchard|Steve Richmond|Jesse Reid|Ameko Eks Mass Carroll|Michael P. title: Russell Madness
